```{r}
data_disp <- function(x){
   # x: a datafarme gotton from xcov_results(xcov, data_use)
  x %>% datatable(rownames = F,
  extensions = 'Buttons', options = list(
    pageLength = 200,
    dom = 'Brt',
    buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print')))}
```
